option.name: keyword
option.value: Copyright [\d,-]+ The Zero Saver Authors\. All Rights Reserved\.

option.name: notice
option.value:
#set( $projectName = "Zero Saver") Copyright $originalComment.match("Copyright ([\d,-]+)", 1, ",")$today.year The $projectName Authors. All Rights Reserved.
